author: pderop
msg: Reduce gap between previous DM 3.2 API: java.util.Properties can now be used to provide service properties (as before), but
we are still using generics in order to allow Activator to use Dictionary<String, Object> for service properties.
So, the following old DM3.2 style can be used:
but you can also store the properties like this:
and there won't be any eclipse warnings.
